title: Deadly Darkness
description: Now that Danielle’s sixteenth birthday has come and gone she is in a race for her life. Not only do nightmares threaten to kill her in her sleep, but someone wants to hurt her; someone with a grudge. She finds out more about the mother that gave her away as well as the life that lead up to her death. She also learns more about her past lives from the boy who holds her heart. Unfortunately her nightmares show her things she wished she didn’t know and that is something Alex can’t protect her from. Time is short as Alex and Mitch try to help her through the worst of her struggles and protect her from unseen forces, but none of them know how long she and Alex really have or if they can stop what is to come.
author: Sarah Dieng
